Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the video by describing it as an Indian army officer intercepting a terrorist, when there is doubt about the identity of the person in the video and their affiliation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the person in the video is an Indian army officer intercepting a terrorist.
Exist alternative explanation: The video could potentially have an alternative explanation, as some users on Twitter suggested that the person in the video was a J&K cop, not an officer in the Indian army.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the person in the video may not be a terrorist, as suggested by comments on Twitter and the description of the video on YouTube.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the person in the video is an Indian army officer intercepting a terrorist without sufficient evidence or verification.
